subject: Re: ITC Experiment Water Method
author: Chad
full_text:
I've removed my picture files from the files folder and put them into their correct place: the photos section. I've uploaded a few additional images some of you may find interesting from the same experiment. Check them out if you'd like. You can find them in the Georgia State Paranormal folder.

I'd like to hear some theories on how and why you think ITC works, especially related to the water method application. Do a lot of you use this method? If you do, do you apply your results in investigations? My home is inhabited by a "visitor" at the present time. Have any of you used ITC as in tool in your paranormal investigations with any success?
